ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] New quest in Firiona Vie
ygData.msgSnippet: I have been thru that whole mine.  That was my initial thought as well, but no such luck.  No sign of any ovens in there.  Dalnir has a forge in it though so I
ygData.messageBody:
I have been thru that whole mine. That was my initial thought as well, but
no such luck. No sign of any ovens in there. Dalnir has a forge in it
though so I imagine there could be an oven in another dungeon. I plan to
check the goblin stronghold in Warslik's woods by the canyon next!

Kitasi

-----Original Message-----
From: Katy Westerman [mailto:katyw@...]
Sent: Monday, May 15, 2000 11:08 AM
To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] New quest in Firiona Vie




New information:

There's a goblin mine in the Lake of Ill Omen that leads to the Warsliks
Wood zone. Has anyone been around there?

Robynn Merrilin
Bard at Large on E'ci
Currently: Level 41

--
